name: A Village in Darkness
description:
A Village in Darkness is a first person adventure game. The areas around your village has been enveloped in darkness! Buy items and fight through enemies to activate each tower to restore the light.

Submitted for the 48hr Aotearoa Game Jam 2021.

My first ever game jam submission. Go easy on me :)

Tips: 

Don't skimp on the lights and potions!

The pistol makes life a lot easier!

CONTROLS: WASD - Move Player SPACE - Jump M1 - Attack
F - Interact 1/2/3 - Change Weapon T - Throw Light H - Use Potion
